is2DNot3D.summary: Returns if the dimension is currently 2D instead of 3D.

onConvert.summary: Invoked whenever the dimension is converted.

conversionTime.summary: The time it takes for the dimension to convert.

conversionTimeScale.summary: The time scale when the dimension is converting.

waitForConversionTime.summary: Suspends the coroutine execution for the amount of conversionTime.

isConverting.summary: Returns if the dimension is converting or not.

waitWhileConverting.summary: Suspends the coroutine execution until the dimension has stopped converting.

batchConversion.summary: If enabled, the conversion is batched and converted over multiple frames, but never longer than the conversionTime.

AddConverter.summary: Add a Converter to the conversion set.

RemoveConverter.summary: Remove a Converter from the conversion set.

ConvertConverters.summary: Convert all Converters in the conversion set.

Convert.summary: Converts this Converter to the current specified dimension.

ConvertTo2D.summary: Converts this Converter to its 2D form.

ConvertTo3D.summary: Converts this Converter to its 3D form.

gameObject3D.summary: The 3D GameObject of the split Transform.

transform3D.summary: The 3D Transform of the split Transform.

gameObject2D.summary: The 2D GameObject of the split Transform.

transform2D.summary: The 2D Transform of the split Transform.

updateMode.summary: Controls when the transforms will be updated.

direction2D.summary: Determines the axis to align in 2D space. If Horizontal, X axis will be aligned, and if vertical, the Y axis.

convert.summary: Activate and deactivate the split transforms on a dimension convert.

UpdateTransforms.summary: Updates the 2D and 3D Transform to have the same position, 2D rotation / rotation and scale as the parent transform.

SetView.param: If the view projection should be set to orthographic or perspective.

ChangeView.summary: Change the camera's view projection over the conversion time.
ChangeView.param: If the view projection should be set to orthographic or perspective.
